text: avara avagananeyu nimage astondu asahaniyavagiddare â€“ nimage sadhyaviddare â€“ bhumiyallondu surangavannu ageyiri athava akasakkondu eniyannu hudukiri hagu (avarige bekagiruva) puraveyannu avarige tandu kodiri. Allahanu bayasiddare (avane) avarellarannu nera margadalli ondu gudisuttiddanu. Nivu arivilladavara salige serabedi
